publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1576 Nigel Don: Grampian Police—That the Parliament congratulates Grampian Police on the news that its officer numbers have passed 1,500 for the first time; believes that this will help boost the fight against crime across the north east, and looks forward to further progress across all police forces toward the Scottish Government’s target of 1,000 new police officers.

S3M-1576 Nigel Don: Grampian Police—That the Parliament congratulates Grampian Police on the news that its officer numbers have passed 1,500 for the first time; believes that this will help boost the fight against crime across the north east, and looks forward to further progress across all police forces toward the Scottish Government’s target of 1,000 new police officers.
S3M-1576 Grampian Police (lodged on 13 March 2008) Joe FitzPatrick*, Bashir Ahmad*, Stuart McMillan*, Brian Adam*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Christina McKelvie*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*
S3M-1576 Grampian Police (lodged on 13 March 2008) Alasdair Allan*, Dave Thompson*, Rob Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1576 Grampian Police (lodged on 13 March 2008) Gil Paterson*
